greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Expansion of x*(1+2*x)/(1+x)^2.
comment: Second binomial transform is x/((1-x)^2(1 - 2x)), or Eulerian numbers A000295(n+1).
link: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (-2,-1).
formula: a(n) = A099570(n) for n > 1. - _R. J. Mathar_, Dec 15 2008
a(n) = A038608(n-2) for n > 2. - _Georg Fischer_, Oct 06 2018
mathematica: CoefficientList[Series[x (1 + 2 x)/(1 + x)^2, {x, 0, 100}], x] (* _Vincenzo Librandi_, Mar 11 2014 *)
program: (MAGMA) [0] cat [(n-2)*(-1)^n : n in [1..100]]; // _Wesley Ivan Hurt_, Dec 11 2016
results.author: _Paul Barry_, Jul 29 2004
